name: Kentucky Community Mental Health Centers Crisis Hotline
description: Kentucky Community Mental Health Centers crisis hotline providing 24/7 mental health crisis intervention and support. Serves multiple counties including Anderson, Bourbon, Boyle, and others through New Vista Community Mental Health Center.
eligibility: Open to all Kentucky residents experiencing mental health crises
notes: This is the statewide crisis hotline for mental health emergencies. Call for immediate assistance with mental health crises, suicidal thoughts, or emotional distress.
verification_method: Web research - confirmed phone number and service details
changes_made: Updated name to be more specific
